Containers.Name: Microsoft SQL Server 2019
Containers.Description: An Unraid template for official MS release on DockerHub.[br] https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server
Containers.Overview: An Unraid template for official MS release on DockerHub.[br] https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server

Variable.Name: ACCEPT_EULA
Variable.Description: Set to "Y" to confirm your acceptance of the End-User Licensing Agreement. See 'License' section here https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server for details.

Variable.Name: SA_PASSWORD
Variable.Description: Set a password for the sysadmin account, must meet password strength rules to work: This password needs to include at least 8 characters of at least three of these four categories: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and non-alphanumeric symbols. See 'Environment Variables' section here https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server for details.

Variable.Name: MSSQL_PID
Variable.Description: "the Product ID (PID) or Edition that the container will run with" values Developer/Express/Standard/Enterprise/EnterpriseCore, Developer edition by default. See 'Environment Variables' section here https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server for details.
